title: Drawing, 1938-88-1550
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash
markings:
Watermark: scrollwork escutcheon with dove over triple mount, above crown, beneathn G A
Verso: Cooper Union Museum for the Arts of Decoration (Lugt#457d and 457e)
provenance: Ex collection: Piancastelli and Mrs. Edward D. Brandegee.
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
description: Horizontal rectangle. A variation of the of -1524. The supports are gaines with half figures of Atlantes. A view of an Ionic arcade is shown over the entablature.
